mapper.insert: INSERT INTO own_book (call_number, receipt_at, status, isbn) VALUES (#{callNumber}, #{receiptAt}, #{status}, #{isbn})
mapper.select: SELECT o.call_number,o.receipt_at, o.status, o.is_reserved, o.version, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.publication_year, b.page_size, b.category_number, b.contents, b.book_index, b.image_url FROM own_book o LEFT JOIN book b ON o.isbn = b.isbn WHERE o.call_number = #{callNumber}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT o.call_number, b.title, b.image_url FROM own_book o LEFT JOIN book b ON o.isbn = b.isbn order by b.publication_year desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT o.call_number, b.title, b.image_url, count(l.call_number) AS cnt FROM loan l LEFT JOIN own_book o ON l.call_number = o.call_number LEFT JOIN book b ON o.isbn = b.isbn group by o.call_number, b.title, b.image_url order by cnt desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sub.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT o.call_number, o.receipt_at, o.status, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.publication_year, b.page_size, b.category_number, b.image_url,count(l.call_number) AS cnt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.contents, 1500, 1) AS contents, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.book_index, 1500, 1) AS book_index FROM own_book o LEFT JOIN book b ON o.isbn = b.isbn LEFT JOIN loan l ON o.call_number = l.call_number WHERE 1=1
AND b.title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
GROUP BY o.call_number, o.receipt_at, o.status, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.publication_year, b.page_size, b.category_number, b.image_url, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.contents, 1500, 1), DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.book_index, 1500, 1)
ORDER BY b.publication_year DESC
ORDER BY cnt DESC
ORDER BY b.title
) sub
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} + #{offset} ) WHERE rnum > #{offset}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT o.call_number, o.receipt_at, o.status, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.publication_year, b.page_size, b.category_number, b.image_url,count(l.call_number) AS cnt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.contents, 1000, 1) AS contents, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.book_index, 1000, 1) AS bookIndex FROM own_book o LEFT JOIN book b ON o.isbn = b.isbn LEFT JOIN loan l ON o.call_number = l.call_number WHERE 1=1
AND b.title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
GROUP BY o.call_number, o.receipt_at, o.status, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.publication_year, b.page_size, b.category_number, b.image_url, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.contents, 1000, 1), DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.book_index, 1000, 1) ) sub
